source: The break statement is useful when you want to exit out of the loop if some condition is true.

pathway = ['Data Science Track', 'Career Ready Track', 
           'Microsoft Office Specialist',  
           'Adobe Certified Professional']
for name in pathway:
    if name == "Microsoft Office Specialist":
        print("loop exit here.")
        break  # end this loop if condition is true.
    print(name)
print("Out of the loop")
